entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
WINDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY

LOWS IN THE MID 40S
